New Records: Donte DiVincenzo scored 26 points, matching a career-high for him in this game
Key Match Events: Julius Randle's driving layup with 4:44 left in the fourth quarter after a challenged offensive foul was a turning point as the Timberwolves never trailed again
Wembanyama's 16-4 run in the third quarter after trailing by 13 early in the period was a significant momentum shift
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards was fined $100,000 for continued use of profanity in postgame media comments
The Timberwolves survived a poor shooting night from the three-point range, making just 11 out of 44 attempts
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Spurs were able to overcome a slow start and a 13-point third-quarter deficit to tie the game late
The Timberwolves' inability to capitalize on their 1-for-11 three-point attempt performance was a key factor in the close outcome
